channel.title: My suggestion to the Moparscape moderators
channel.description:
If you read my rant a week ago, you would understand completely why i am mad. Heres a quick description.
[i][u]These forums are embarrasing.[/u][/i]
Heres my suggestion for the board
Instead of locking a topic, quote main thread in a message and send it to the owner with the reason why it was locked. So, it is not taking up any board space and the user knows that it was removed and why it was

item.title: My suggestion to the Moparscape moderators
item.dc:creator: @sp00nkitty sp00nkitty
item.description:
@sp00nkitty wrote:

yer i stick by that

it is good to no y ur post was locked

Read full topic
